species.name: golurk
descriptions: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.
Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon. They run on a mysterious energy.
It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.
Some say that ancient people invented Golurk to serve as a laborer. It follows its master’s orders faithfully.

abilities.name: iron-fist
abilities.effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.

abilities.name: klutz
abilities.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.

abilities.name: no-guard
abilities.effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.
